page.title: 02PONIES AT INVERINAN
page.content: On Saturdays I go up to the farm at 9.30am.I feed the ponies on pony nuts.Then I groom them.The names of the ponies are Star,Luna,Ossian and Sham.Mrs Pascoe rides Luna and I ride Star.At 12.00pm I go up again and take Star and Luna out then I take them to the farm.I put on the saddle and bridle.I have my own riding hat, boots,jacket and crop.For our ride we go around a big field.I can walk, canter,trot and gallop.We come back then we take the bridle and saddle off then put the headcollar on.Then I get some pony nuts and give them it.Then take the ponies back to the field.Then I cycle home then I take out my bridle then clean it and is this the day of riding.
